title: Blue carpet: The 2017 Independent Spirit Awards
text: Blue carpet: The 2017 Independent Spirit Awards Stars were in sunny Santa Monica, Calif., on Saturday for the Film Independent Spirit Awards, traditionally held the night before the Oscars. (Some nominees are up for awards at both shows.) Here's who walked the blue carpet, starting with Ruth Negga. Post to Facebook Blue carpet: The 2017 Independent Spirit Awards Stars were in sunny Santa Monica, Calif., on Saturday for the Film Independent Spirit Awards, traditionally held the night before the Oscars. (Some nominees are up for awards at both shows.) Here's who walked the blue carpet, starting with Ruth Negga.  //usat.ly/2lHsr8b   Join the Nation's Conversation   Blue carpet: The 2017 Independent Spirit Awards None Stars were in sunny Santa Monica, Calif., on Saturday for the Film Independent Spirit Awards, traditionally held the night before the Oscars. (Some nominees are up for awards at both shows.) Here's who walked the blue carpet, starting with Ruth Negga. Richard Shotwell, /Invision/AP
